query:
ALTER TABLE jobDescriptions 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS costCenterApproverId INT NULL AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS salaryLeaderId INT NULL AFTER costCenterApproverId,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS costCenterApprovedAt DATETIME NULL AFTER salaryLeaderId,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS salaryLeaderApprovedAt DATETIME NULL AFTER costCenterApprovedAt;
